titles.title: Commending the Florida Atlantic University Owls for their historic win in the 2007 R+L Carriers New Orleans Bowl.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Higher Education, Lifelong Learning, and Competitiveness.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

committee.subcommittee: Higher Education, Lifelong Learning, and Competitiveness
committee.name: House Education and Labor

bill.summary: 1/16/2008--Introduced. Commends the Florida Atlantic University Owls for their historic win in the 2007 R+L Carriers New Orleans Bowl. Recognizes the achievements of the players, coaches, students, and support staff who were instrumental in the Owls' victory and their continued success as a football program.
